movies.title: Padayappa
movies.description: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

movies.title: Story of Bunny
movies.description:
Big Buck Bunny is a light-hearted animated short about a gentle, kind rabbit living peacefully in a forest.
His calm life is disturbed by three mischievous rodents who constantly bully and tease him.
After enduring their pranks for too long, Bunny decides to stand up for himself.
Using cleverness instead of cruelty, he teaches the bullies a lesson in a humorous way.
The film delivers a fun message about self-respect, courage, and kindness without violence.

movies.title: Sathuranga Vettai
movies.description:
Sathuranga Vettai (2014) is a Tamil heist-thriller that revolves around the life of Gandhi Babu, a highly intelligent and smooth-talking con artist. He believes money is the ultimate goal of life and uses clever scams, psychological manipulation, and flawless planning to cheat people without any violence.

The film follows his journey through various cons—selling fake snakes, running pyramid schemes, and luring greedy people into traps. But when his past victims unite against him and he gets entangled with dangerous people, Gandhi realizes that every smart move in this "chess game" of life has consequences.
